translations.name: The New Testament in Paraguayan Guarani
translations.description: The New Testament was translated from Greek into Guaraní by Dr John William Lindsay (1875-1946), who was a Scottish medical missionary based in Belen, Paraguay. The New Testament was printed by the British and Foreign Bible Society in 1913, and the text was digitised by the Paraguayan Bible Society in 2013.

translations.name: Tûpâ Ñandeyára Ñeê 1913
